articles.author: John Doe
articles.title: India launches new AI initiative to boost digital economy
articles.description: The Indian government has unveiled a national AI mission aimed at accelerating innovation in healthcare, agriculture, and education.
articles.content: The initiative will fund startups and research centers to boost India's digital capabilities...

articles.author: Jane Smith
articles.title: New 5G technology rollout begins in major Indian cities
articles.description: Major telecom providers in India have begun rolling out 5G services with promises of faster speeds and better coverage.
articles.content: 5G technology promises download speeds of up to 10Gbps and ultra-low latency...

articles.author: Ravi Kumar
articles.title: ISRO to launch AI-based satellite for disaster management
articles.description: ISRO is preparing to launch an AI-powered satellite that can detect natural disasters and send real-time alerts.
articles.content: The satellite uses machine learning algorithms to predict floods, landslides, and cyclones...
